title: Dark and white chocolate terrine with strawberry and ginger compôte and praline
ingredients: 200g/7oz good quality dark chocolate, minimum 70 per cent cocoa solids, roughly chopped
3 gelatine leaves, soaked in cold water to soften, then squeezed dry
2 gelatine leaves, soaked in cold water to soften, then squeezed dry
450g/1lb strawberries, hulls removed, cut in half
30g/1¼oz stem ginger (from a jar), roughly chopped
